And, when was this mythical event TheCode?  I've never ignored damage, even 
from you.  The last time you shot at Stinkbomb, you shot at an area that 
didn't even exist (his middle area of his body gone from extensive 
explosions).  The first time, I accepted, even though it was moding really 
bad.  You, never excepted Ramhorn's charge after Suukie hit the ground.  That 
was a mode there, and ignoring damage.  But, I really don't want to argue 
with you, it's pointless.
